article_title: Gazans say Israel only publishes evacuation maps to shield itself from criticism.
sentence: But  Gaza  resident  Tariq  Dahlan  says  there  is  currently  “no  safe  place”  in  Gaza,  and  that  he  believes  the  Israeli  army  only  publishes  such  maps  to  shield  itself  from  international  criticism  as  civilians  are  killed.
